title: lost my pixel 2. But the phone number on the account is old can’t change it as it sends a code
content:
I have lost my phone. Have managed to log into my account to locate it. Recovery options set up but... the number on the phone is wrong. I can’t change it in my account as it wants to send an sms to the phone to confirm it. 
I’ve set The recovery number as my number too by mistake 
So when it tried to call my device it’s the wrong number
Please help
